channel.title: My ice blitz errors when i try and do this

item.title: My ice blitz errors when i try and do this
item.dc:creator: @anuslikker anuslikker
item.description:
@anuslikker wrote:

try this one:
it could be wrong cause you got magicspell and not spellID
I dont know it right but could be

if(spellID == 12871) // ice blitz (lvl 82 spell) { if(playerLevel[6] >= 82) { if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 20)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 10)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(555, 30)==false)) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); sendMessage("You need 20 "+getItemName(560)+", 10 "+getItemName(4278)+" and 30 "+getItemName(555)); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 20)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 10)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(555, 30)==true)) { startAnimation(1978); hitDiff = 6 + misc.random(19); castOnPlayer.entangle(); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); stillgfx(368, absY, absX); stillgfx(367, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.sendMessage("You are frozen!"); PkingDelay = 15; deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 20); deleteItem(4278, getItemSlot(4278), 10); deleteItem(555, getItemSlot(555), 30); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 82) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 82 to cast this spell."); } }

Read full topic

item.title: My ice blitz errors when i try and do this
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

else else if(castSpell == 12871) //ice blitz { if(playerLevel[6] >= 82) { if((playerHasItemAmount(555, 3) == false) || (playerHasItemAmount(560, 2) == false) || (playerHasItemAmout(4278, 2) == false)) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(555, 3) == true) && (playerHasItemAmount(560, 2) == true) && (playerHasItemAmout(4278, 2) == true)) { startAnimation(1978); hitDiff = misc.random(22); castOnPlayer.entangle(); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); stillgfx(368, absY, absX); stillgfx(367, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.sendMessage("You are frozen!"); PkingDelay = 15; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; deleteItem(555,getItemSlot(555), 3); deleteItem(560,getItemSlot(560), 2); deleteItem(4278, getItemSlot(4278), 2); } } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 82) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 82 to cast this spell."); } }

why does this error when i try and compile?
